abstract: Citic Securities, China’s largest brokerage by market value, suspended trading of its shares in Shanghai, saying it is holding “important” discussions.
snippet: Citic Securities, China’s largest brokerage by market value, suspended trading of its shares in Shanghai, saying it is holding “important” discussions.
lead_paragraph: Citic Securities, China’s largest brokerage by market value, suspended trading of its shares in Shanghai, saying it is holding “important” discussions, Bloomberg News reported.

abstract: Agricultural Bank of China, the nation’s third-largest lender by assets plans to attempt what could be the biggest initial public offering in history by July, people with knowledge of the matter told Bloomberg News.
snippet: Agricultural Bank of China, the nation’s third-largest lender by assets plans to attempt what could be the biggest initial public offering in history by July, people with knowledge of the matter told Bloomberg News.
lead_paragraph: Agricultural Bank of China, the nation’s third-largest lender by assets, plans to attempt what could be the biggest initial public offering in history by July, people with knowledge of the matter told Bloomberg News.

headline.main: China Bank Thinks It Can Get $30 Billion in I.P.O.,

abstract: As the loan officers for a major regional branch of China’s central bank were preparing to issue more loans, their computer screens froze. There were no bugs in the system: rather, the bank’s branch-to-headquarters intranet network had been deliberately shut down.
snippet: As the loan officers for a major regional branch of China’s central bank were preparing to issue more loans, their computer screens froze. There were no bugs in the system: rather, the bank’s branch-to-headquarters intranet network had been delibe...
lead_paragraph: Chinese banking regulators have tried a new tactic in their fight to curb lending: cutting their computers’ connection, Caijin magazine reported.

headline.main: In China, Loan Regulations Without a Loophole
